com.software.reuze

Class pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA

  • public class pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA
extends Object
    this is a class for solving real-time fluid dynamics simulations based on Navier-Stokes equations and code from Jos Stam's paper "Real-Time Fluid Dynamics for Games" http://www.dgp.toronto.edu/people/stam/reality/Research/pdf/GDC03.pdf Other useful resources and implementations I looked at while building this lib: Mike Ash (C) - http://mikeash.com/?page=pyblog/fluid-simulation-for-dummies.html Alexander McKenzie (Java) - http://www.multires.caltech.edu/teaching/demos/java/stablefluids.htm Pierluigi Pesenti (AS3 port of Alexander's) - http://blog.oaxoa.com/2008/01/21/actionscript-3-fluids-simulation/ Gustav Taxen (C) - http://www.nada.kth.se/~gustavt/fluids/ Dave Wallin (C++) - http://nuigroup.com/touchlib/ (uses portions from Gustav's)
    Author:
    Memo Akten

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      destroy solver and release all memory
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA enableRGB(boolean isRGB)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) set whether solver should work with monochrome dye (default) or RGB

      (INFO) return average density of fluid

      (INFO) return average speed of fluid

      (INFO) get fluid cell index for (i,j) cell coordinates

      (INFO) get fluid cell index for normalized (x, y) coordinates
      int getNumCells()
      (INFO) return total number of cells (_NX+2) * (_NY+2)
      float getUniformity()
      (INFO) return average uniformity (distribution of densities and dye)
      float getVisc()
      (INFO) return viscosity
      int getWidth()
      (INFO) return number of cells in x direction (_NX+2)
      boolean isInited()
      (INFO) whether the solver has been setup or not
      void randomizeColor()
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) randomize dye (useful for debugging)
      void reset()
      initialize solver (remove all velocities and dye)
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA setDeltaT(float dt)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) set timestep
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA setFadeSpeed(float fadeSpeed)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) set how quickly the fluid dye dissipates and fades out
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA setSolverIterations(int solverIterations)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) set number of iterations for solver (higher is slower but more accurate)
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA setup(int NX, int NY)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) re-initialize solver and setup number of cells
      pf_FluidSolver2D_MSA setVisc(float newVisc)
      (OPTIONAL SETUP) set viscosity
      void update()
      this must be called once every frame to move the solver one step forward i.e.
